content: rib pattern on both sides of the sock broken rib pattern size s size m size l row 1- k 6p1 * repeat * row 1- k7p1 * repeat * row 1- k8p1 * repeat * eight times eight times eight times row 2- k all sts row 2- k all sts row 2- k all sts repeat row 1 and row 2 for your size until the leg of your sock measures 2 not including the cuff © 2020 amy van well designs all rights reserved it is illegal to sell the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically heel flap the following tutorial will be very helpful when knitting the heel flap heel turn and gusset please follow along with the video as you read these instructions https //www youtube com/watch v=sntupn-3cxg the heel flap will be knit flat on the first 28 32 36 sts of the two socks if you re doing a contrast heel cut your yarn and switch to the new colour you will execute each row of the heel flap on both socks at the same time for a rs row you will knit across the rs of the first half of sock a then the rs of the first half of sock b for a ws row you will then turn the work and knit across the ws of sock b then across the ws of sock a rs sl1k1 * repeat 14 16 18 times ws p all stitches continue in this pattern until you have 28 32 36 row to keep count there should be 14 16 18 slipped stitches on the edge of your heel flap when you re done 28 32 36 row heel turn you will work on the heel of sock a by itself for the whole heel turn minus the final purl row complete the whole heel turn for sock b including its final purl row then finish the purl row for sock a this will leave you in the correct position to pick up the gusset row 1 rs - sl1 k15 17 19 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws - sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs - sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 4 ws -sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn the pattern you are now following is knitting or purling to one stitch before the gap knitting/purling two stitches together completing one more stitch and then turning you will continue in this pattern for sock a until you re about to begin your final purl row where you will have just completed a ssk and will be done with a rs row with no stitches remaining at this point don t turn the sock instead move onto the heel turn for sock b © 2020 amy van well designs all rights reserved it is illegal to sell the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically and complete all the row for the heel flap including the final
